verbs.description: President Donald Trump [V: has] nominated Ariana Fajardo Orshan , a Miami - Dade Circuit Court judge , to be the next U.S. attorney for South Florida .
[ARG0: President Donald Trump] has [V: nominated] [ARG1: Ariana Fajardo Orshan , a Miami - Dade Circuit Court judge ,] [ARG2: to be the next U.S. attorney for South Florida] .
President Donald Trump has nominated [ARG1: Ariana Fajardo Orshan , a Miami - Dade Circuit Court judge ,] to [V: be] [ARG2: the next U.S. attorney for South Florida] .
